column1: Uchi////-Brie ringo - This is the dish that made me fall in love with Uchi in Austin. It's just so perfectly composed. You get 4 bites of (bottom to top) sweet potato chip
column2: brie that's been tempura fried so it's crispy on the outside and hot and gooey on the inside
column3: apple chutney on top. It's a dish of juxtapositions: sweet/salty
